page.title: 04Farming in Upton District.
page.content: {CROPS.}Most farms are rented and comprise grassland,winterwheat,barley oats,silage,sugarbeet,fodderbeet,hay, beans.{LIVESTOCK}mainly friesian cows,Hereford cross Friesian beef cattle,a few sheep. A few horses and ponies for recreation.{MACHINERY. Tractors, combine harvesters, precision Drills,hedge trimmers, sprayers,tractor mounted ploughs. electric milking machine and cooler, electric fencing unit,chainsaws, tractor powered piledrivers. Ploughs, harrows,rolls circular saws, etc. {WORKERS.}include the farmer and his staff of dairymen,tractor drivers, apprentices, shared secretarial help, some shared seasonal labour.Some workers own their homes and cars. Average basic wage for 40-42 hour week Â£130 approx.With 3 weeks leave.
